item.description: Number of HAProxy pings per min

trigger.name: Ceph: Drop in number of active PGs
Ceph Full
trigger.description: Ceph File system in getting full

trigger.name: Functional Check Error: RGW
trigger.description: Unable to create/destroy new keys in RGW

trigger.expression: {Template BCPC Compute:system.run[ip route show table mgmt].str(default)}=0
trigger.name: IP Route Check for MGMT failed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template BCPC Compute:system.run[ip route show table storage].str(scope)}=0
trigger.name: IP Route Check for STORAGE failed on {HOST.NAME}
RabbitMQ File Descriptor Usage Exceeds Threshold
RGW: HAProxy no longer pingging
trigger.description: HAPRoxy pings Rados Gateway every few sec. If this stops it probably means that HAProxy has dropped the host.
